subject: Marijuana
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: The Florida State star Preston Parker was arrested late Monday and charged with carrying a concealed .45-caliber pistol and a small amount of marijuana. The Seminoles already have six starters sitting out suspensions from a classroom cheating scandal last year. Parker was named Florida State’s most valuable player last season after leading the team with 1,513 all-purpose yards and 62 receptions.
snippet: The Florida State star Preston Parker was arrested late Monday and charged with carrying a concealed .45-caliber pistol and a small amount of marijuana. The Seminoles already have six starters sitting out suspensions from a classroom cheating scandal...
